name: Rubik's Cube for Rubic
description:
Game for the Secret Santa Game Jam and my giftee loves solvable cubes.

Github repo if you want to download and add to it -> Doughboy02/RubiksCube: 2020 Secret Santa Game Jam for my giftee Rubic, he likes Rubik's Cubes (github.com)

(remember this game was made during a jam so the code is not optimized, but that just means you can optimize it if you are interested!)
